TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ExtenderControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExtenderControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl

Docs.summary: Provides an abstract base class for an extender control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ExtenderControl class enables you to programmatically add AJAX functionality to an ASP.NET server control. The ExtenderControl inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> interface. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by all ASP.NET server controls. The <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> interface is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly. Instead, you create a derived type.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the ExtenderControl class. For a tutorial related to this example, see [Creating an Extender Control](../Topic/Creating%20an%20Extender%20Control%20to%20Associate%20a%20Client%20Behavior%20with%20a%20Web%20Server%20Control.md).
[!CODE [run:ExtenderControlTutorial1](run:ExtenderControlTutorial1)]

Docs.param: The server control to which the extender is associated.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, registers the objects for the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> GetScriptReferences() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, registers the script libraries for the control.
Docs.returns: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
Docs.value: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> event and registers the extender control with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks After the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event of the base class is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the extender control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that receives the server control content.
Docs.summary: Sends server control content to a provided object, which writes the content to be rendered in the browser window.

Docs.param: The server control that the extender is associated with.
Docs.summary: Registers the objects for the control. This method is a private member and cannot be inherited.
Docs.returns: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and that contains objects.
Docs.value: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and that contains objects.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the control that the extender is associated with.
Docs.value: The ID of the server control that is being extended.
